$interpreted: Surprised Contestant: What's going on!? I paid my fare fair and square, and now you're making me leave?
Haunted House Employee: We've gotta test out the fire systems in the haunted house, very sorry for the inconvenience...
Angry Contestant: Refund! I want a refund!!
Joan: (Gah! We're all stuck here until they come out~~)
Joan: (I'll give 'em a fright with these toy firecrackers...)
Joan: ...Ehhh?
Fog Sect Soldier: Thief! Put down your weapon and put your hands in the air!
Joan: Gwaaah! I'm just an innocent young woman, don't be so rough!
Haunted House Assistant: I've been looking forward to meeting the real Storyteller for so long! You're a phoney! How dare you sully the Storyteller's name!!
Joan: H-How've I been discovered!? Since when!?
Haunted House Assistant: I knew something wasn't right as soon as I looked at your autograph—
Haunted House Assistant: The real Storyteller would never use such a floral, fancy script!
Haunted House Assistant: If the Boss hadn't told me to play along a little longer, I'd have marched you off to the authorities myself! Imposter!
Joan: (Haaah!? My beautiful handwriting betrayed me!!!)
Joan: It's all over now. Well, since I've been found out...
Joan: —Watch this!!
Joan: Hyaah! That hurts!
Haunted House Assistant: Think about what you've done while you rot in the cells!
Haunted House Assistant: ...Hmm? Who's there?
Haunted House Assistant: —Gyaaaagh!
Fog Sect Soldier: Ah!? That p-p-p-puppet's moving by itself!
Fog Sect Soldier: G-g-g-ghost! There's a ghost!!
Joan: (...Hah, it's—)
Miranda: Phew... Ugh, I think I'm gonna pass out soon...
Shirley: ...
Haunted House Boss: (This one's real bothersome...)
Haunted House Boss: (The soldiers should've arrived by now! But I don't hear anything outside...)
Haunted House Boss: Pah!! What's wrong with them!? Hurry up and catch these thieves!
Joan: Here we come~
Miranda: Great, you're here...
Haunted House Boss: Wh-what! Who's there!? Shirley! Get them, quick!
Shirley: —I have to protect them...
Tindoiimu: Now!
Joan: Got it!
Haunted House Boss: Aaghh dammit!! My book!!?
Haunted House Boss: Shirley... You useless good-for-nothing!!
Shirley: Ughhh, ggaahhhh...
Shirley: —Who's there...
Shirley: Who's c-c-calling my name?
Haunted House Boss: Me, you idiot! I'm summoning you, your master!
Shirley: Master?
Joan: Waah!? Don't listen to her!
Miranda: You're nobody's plaything!
Tindoiimu: Wait. She doesn't look quite right...
Shirley: Master, heh, heheh...
Haunted House Boss: Aiyaaah that burns! Save me, save me-aaa—
Fog Sect Soldier: What's going on here!? We've been ambushed...
Fog Sect Soldier: —Gyaaaagh!
Miranda: I-innocent people are gonna get hurt if this goes on any longer... Please, stop...
Miranda: Argh!
Joan: Are you all right!?
Tindoiimu: ...The room's been locked down. We can't keep this up for long.
Miranda: Damn! Isn't there another way?
Joan: Oh yeah! Maybe there's something in the book about calming angry spirits!
Joan: B-but there's a lot of pages to get through, I'll need a little more time...
Miranda: —I can do this.
Miranda: How about you? Tim?
Joan: Got it!
Joan: It says here: "This incantation liberates the spirits that they might find eternal rest..."
Miranda: ...Great, so hurry up and—
Joan: "—But so too will this Book and any memory of it disappear..."
Joan: What!!!?
Joan: In that case, I'm very sorry... But I'm gonna take my chances...
Tindoiimu: What!?
Joan: Yaaaah—Stop grabbing at me, let me go! I didn't come all this way to the East just to lose everything!!
Miranda: We're at the moment of truth, and now you're gonna start jabbering all this nonsense!?
Shirley: Hyaaauughh—
Tindoiimu: "Remove these shackles, and let the soul roam free—"
Tindoiimu: Go home, Shirley. You're free now, go in peace...
Joan: Nooo! My treasure... waaahh...
Tingko: You should eat, Princess...
Tindoiimu: I'm not hungry.
Tingko: You've been moody ever since you got back.
Tingko: Toyokuni said he ran into you last night when he went to join the rescue at the haunted house. He said you were in a daze, like maybe you'd been set upon by evil spirits.
Tingko: I didn't believe it at first, but by looks of you now—
Tingko: I'd never have let you wander off by yourself if I'd known you'd come back so gloomy. Jeez!
Tindoiimu: ………
Tindoiimu: (When on earth did I get that Charm back? I don't know what's been happening the last few days...)
Tingko: Ah! Fireworks!
Tindoiimu: So beautiful...
Miranda: ...Huh? Fireworks? Now?
Vendor: Oh! These fireworks mark the end of the ceremony~ They're telling the dead that playtime's over, time to go home!
Miranda: Ha! There's no such thing as ghosts. Haha!
Vendor: You've got a lot of guts to say such things. Aren't they afraid of ghosts in the West?
Miranda: Sure! But there's something more important than fear... Like—Hey, Boss! Let's have another round!
Vendor: Haha, coming right up! I hope you can pay your tab~~
Miranda: (Speaking of which, whatever happened to those debts I had to work off at the haunted house? Why'd it go out of business all of a sudden...)
Miranda: Nevermind!
Miranda: It's so beautiful out here. I wish I had someone to share it with. Next year I'll bring Master along with me...
Haunted House Employee: Gee, I almost didn't make it out of there!
Happy Vendor: Oh my, what are you doing out here? Shouldn't you be back home with your wife and kid?
Haunted House Employee: No way! I heard rumors that spirits were being held captive again this year, so I found myself a disguise and looked about for help...
Happy Vendor: Some things never change, haha. You still don't know how to mind your own business, even now you've reached the afterlife...
Shirley: My child's grown up safe and sound somewhere, right?
Shirley: Thank you, thank you so much... You've helped return a treasured memory to me.
Shirley: Farewell...
Joan: Waaaah! What the!?
Joan: What did I come all this way for again... Looking for treasure? Or was it for the hunkiest man in the East?
Joan: B-but I don't even like hairy guys that much!!
Joan: How strange~~~

Model.Text: What's going on!? I paid my fare fair and square, and now you're making me leave?
We've gotta test out the fire systems in the haunted house, very sorry for the inconvenience...
Refund! I want a refund!!
(Gah! We're all stuck here until they come out~~)
(I'll give 'em a fright with these toy firecrackers...)
...Ehhh?
Thief! Put down your weapon and put your hands in the air!
Gwaaah! I'm just an innocent young woman, don't be so rough!
I've been looking forward to meeting the real Storyteller for so long! You're a phoney! How dare you sully the Storyteller's name!!
H-How've I been discovered!? Since when!?
I knew something wasn't right as soon as I looked at your autograph—
The real Storyteller would never use such a floral, fancy script!
If the Boss hadn't told me to play along a little longer, I'd have marched you off to the authorities myself! Imposter!
(Haaah!? My beautiful handwriting betrayed me!!!)
It's all over now. Well, since I've been found out...
—Watch this!!
Hyaah! That hurts!
Think about what you've done while you rot in the cells!
...Hmm? Who's there?
—Gyaaaagh!
Ah!? That p-p-p-puppet's moving by itself!
G-g-g-ghost! There's a ghost!!
(...Hah, it's—)
Phew... Ugh, I think I'm gonna pass out soon...
(This one's real bothersome...)
(The soldiers should've arrived by now! But I don't hear anything outside...)
Pah!! What's wrong with them!? Hurry up and catch these thieves!
Here we come~
Great, you're here...
Wh-what! Who's there!? Shirley! Get them, quick!
—I have to protect them...
Now!
Got it!
Aaghh dammit!! My book!!?
Shirley... You useless good-for-nothing!!
Ughhh, ggaahhhh...
—Who's there...
Who's c-c-calling my name?
Me, you idiot! I'm summoning you, your master!
Master?
Waah!? Don't listen to her!
You're nobody's plaything!
Wait. She doesn't look quite right...
Master, heh, heheh...
Aiyaaah that burns! Save me, save me-aaa—
What's going on here!? We've been ambushed...
—Gyaaaagh!
I-innocent people are gonna get hurt if this goes on any longer... Please, stop...
Argh!
Are you all right!?
...The room's been locked down. We can't keep this up for long.
Damn! Isn't there another way?
Oh yeah! Maybe there's something in the book about calming angry spirits!
B-but there's a lot of pages to get through, I'll need a little more time...
—I can do this.
How about you? Tim?
Got it!
It says here: "This incantation liberates the spirits that they might find eternal rest..."
...Great, so hurry up and—
"—But so too will this Book and any memory of it disappear..."
What!!!?
In that case, I'm very sorry... But I'm gonna take my chances...
What!?
Yaaaah—Stop grabbing at me, let me go! I didn't come all this way to the East just to lose everything!!
We're at the moment of truth, and now you're gonna start jabbering all this nonsense!?
Hyaaauughh—
"Remove these shackles, and let the soul roam free—"
Go home, Shirley. You're free now, go in peace...
Nooo! My treasure... waaahh...
You should eat, Princess...
I'm not hungry.
You've been moody ever since you got back.
Toyokuni said he ran into you last night when he went to join the rescue at the haunted house. He said you were in a daze, like maybe you'd been set upon by evil spirits.
I didn't believe it at first, but by looks of you now—
I'd never have let you wander off by yourself if I'd known you'd come back so gloomy. Jeez!
(When on earth did I get that Charm back? I don't know what's been happening the last few days...)
Ah! Fireworks!
So beautiful...
...Huh? Fireworks? Now?
Oh! These fireworks mark the end of the ceremony~ They're telling the dead that playtime's over, time to go home!
Ha! There's no such thing as ghosts. Haha!
You've got a lot of guts to say such things. Aren't they afraid of ghosts in the West?
Sure! But there's something more important than fear... Like—Hey, Boss! Let's have another round!
Haha, coming right up! I hope you can pay your tab~~
(Speaking of which, whatever happened to those debts I had to work off at the haunted house? Why'd it go out of business all of a sudden...)
Nevermind!
It's so beautiful out here. I wish I had someone to share it with. Next year I'll bring Master along with me...
Gee, I almost didn't make it out of there!
Oh my, what are you doing out here? Shouldn't you be back home with your wife and kid?
No way! I heard rumors that spirits were being held captive again this year, so I found myself a disguise and looked about for help...
Some things never change, haha. You still don't know how to mind your own business, even now you've reached the afterlife...
My child's grown up safe and sound somewhere, right?
Thank you, thank you so much... You've helped return a treasured memory to me.
Farewell...
Waaaah! What the!?
What did I come all this way for again... Looking for treasure? Or was it for the hunkiest man in the East?
B-but I don't even like hairy guys that much!!
How strange~~~

Maybe there's something in the book about calming angry spirits!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_26_001","SpeakerName":"Joan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0241","IconName":"h0241s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"B-but there's a lot of pages to get through, I'll need a little more time...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_26_002","SpeakerName":"Miranda","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0240","IconName":"h0240s5_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"\u2014I can do this.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_26_003","SpeakerName":"Miranda","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0240","IconName":"h0240s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"How about you? Tim?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Joan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0241","IconName":"h0241s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Got it!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Joan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0241","IconName":"h0241s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It says here: \"This incantation liberates the spirits that they might find eternal rest...\"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_28_001","SpeakerName":"Miranda","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0240","IconName":"h0240s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Great, so hurry up and\u2014","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_28_002","SpeakerName":"Joan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0241","IconName":"h0241s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"\"\u2014But so too will this Book and any memory of it disappear...\"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_28_003","SpeakerName":"Joan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0241","IconName":"h0241s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What!!!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Joan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0241","IconName":"h0241s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"In that case, I'm very sorry... But I'm gonna take my chances...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_29_001","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0238","IconName":"h0238s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Joan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0241","IconName":"h0241s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yaaaah\u2014Stop grabbing at me, let me go! I didn't come all this way to the East just to lose everything!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_30_001","SpeakerName":"Miranda","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0240","IconName":"h0240s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"We're at the moment of truth, and now you're gonna start jabbering all this nonsense!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_30_002","SpeakerName":"Shirley","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0239","IconName":"h0239s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hyaaauughh\u2014","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_31_000","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0238","IconName":"h0238s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"\"Remove these shackles, and let the soul roam free\u2014\"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_31_001","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0238","IconName":"h0238s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Go home, Shirley. You're free now, go in peace...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_31_002","SpeakerName":"Joan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0241","IconName":"h0241s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Nooo! My treasure... waaahh...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_32_000","SpeakerName":"Tingko","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3401c3","IconName":"h3401c3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You should eat, Princess...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_32_001","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s3_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm not hungry.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_32_002","SpeakerName":"Tingko","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3401c3","IconName":"h3401c3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You've been moody ever since you got back.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_33_000","SpeakerName":"Tingko","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3401c3","IconName":"h3401c3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Toyokuni said he ran into you last night when he went to join the rescue at the haunted house. He said you were in a daze, like maybe you'd been set upon by evil spirits.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_33_001","SpeakerName":"Tingko","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3401c3","IconName":"h3401c3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I didn't believe it at first, but by looks of you now\u2014","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_34_000","SpeakerName":"Tingko","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3401c3","IconName":"h3401c3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'd never have let you wander off by yourself if I'd known you'd come back so gloomy. Jeez!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_34_001","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s3_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"\u2026\u2026\u2026","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_35_000","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(When on earth did I get that Charm back? I don't know what's been happening the last few days...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_35_001","SpeakerName":"Tingko","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3401c3","IconName":"h3401c3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ah! Fireworks!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_36_000","SpeakerName":"Tindoiimu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0183","IconName":"h0183s3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So beautiful...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_37_000","SpeakerName":"Miranda","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0157","IconName":"h0157s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Huh? Fireworks? Now?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_37_001","SpeakerName":"Vendor","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3492c4","IconName":"t3492c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh! These fireworks mark the end of the ceremony~ They're telling the dead that playtime's over, time to go home!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_38_000","SpeakerName":"Miranda","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0157","IconName":"h0157s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ha! There's no such thing as ghosts. Haha!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_38_001","SpeakerName":"Vendor","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3492c4","IconName":"t3492c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You've got a lot of guts to say such things. Aren't they afraid of ghosts in the West?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_38_002","SpeakerName":"Miranda","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0157","IconName":"h0157s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sure! But there's something more important than fear... Like\u2014Hey, Boss! Let's have another round!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_38_003","SpeakerName":"Vendor","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3492c4","IconName":"t3492c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Haha, coming right up! I hope you can pay your tab~~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_39_000","SpeakerName":"Miranda","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0157","IconName":"h0157s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(Speaking of which, whatever happened to those debts I had to work off at the haunted house? Why'd it go out of business all of a sudden...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_39_001","SpeakerName":"Miranda","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0157","IconName":"h0157s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Nevermind!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_40_000","SpeakerName":"Miranda","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0157","IconName":"h0157s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It's so beautiful out here. I wish I had someone to share it with. Next year I'll bring Master along with me...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_41_000","SpeakerName":"Haunted House Employee","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3612c3","IconName":"t3612c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Gee, I almost didn't make it out of there!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_42_000","SpeakerName":"Happy Vendor","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3538c4","IconName":"h3538c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh my, what are you doing out here? Shouldn't you be back home with your wife and kid?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_42_001","SpeakerName":"Haunted House Employee","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3612c3","IconName":"t3612c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"No way! I heard rumors that spirits were being held captive again this year, so I found myself a disguise and looked about for help...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_42_002","SpeakerName":"Happy Vendor","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3538c4","IconName":"h3538c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Some things never change, haha. You still don't know how to mind your own business, even now you've reached the afterlife...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_43_000","SpeakerName":"Shirley","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0047","IconName":"h0047s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"My child's grown up safe and sound somewhere, right?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_43_001","SpeakerName":"Shirley","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0047","IconName":"h0047s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Thank you, thank you so much... You've helped return a treasured memory to me.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_43_002","SpeakerName":"Shirley","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0047","IconName":"h0047s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Farewell...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_44_000","SpeakerName":"Joan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0241","IconName":"h0241s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Waaaah! What the!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_45_000","SpeakerName":"Joan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0241","IconName":"h0241s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What did I come all this way for again... Looking for treasure? Or was it for the hunkiest man in the East?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_45_001","SpeakerName":"Joan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0241","IconName":"h0241s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"B-but I don't even like hairy guys that much!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_032_006_dialog_english##_45_002","SpeakerName":"Joan","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0241","IconName":"h0241s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"How strange~~~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
